## Why small businesses love Close Yes, love. (Really.)
### Built for speed and ease of use
Close is up to 50% faster than other CRMs‚Äì‚Äìwhich helps your team work faster and easier. More prospects contacted = more deals closed. Plus, Close is designed for your team to use all day, every day, in the real world. You shouldn't need a computer science degree to use your CRM. Getting started with Close takes hours, not weeks or months. 
_The ease of use from a sales seat is crucial. There is zero clutter, or unnecessary steps. It‚Äôs click, call, text, email, notes‚Äîall in one convenient spot._
![Sam Martin Headshot](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61717799a852418a278cfa9b/66571df5fd843dc8569232d0_sam-martin.png)
Sam Martin, Five25 Capital
![Close Inbox and Lead Import](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61717799a852418a278cfa9b/6659e83661768a1ec6d6c63b_close-crm-inbox-import.webp)

### Everything you need to close a deal, all in one spot
Stop paying for a ton of different tools just to make a sale. Customers can get lost in the shuffle! We believe in keeping it simple. Every tool you use in your sales process either lives within Close or integrates with it seamlessly. You‚Äôll make phone calls, send emails, manage follow-ups, and track your pipeline, all without ever leaving Close.
_Close has been a game changer for our team. I love how you can send texts, emails, set reminders, create tasks, and schedule reach outs all in one place. It's absolutely up-leveled our team, our service, and our sales._
![Erika Neeley Headshot](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61717799a852418a278cfa9b/66571ec260dd8f6fe680ab72_erika-neeley.png)
Erika Neeley, Women Rocking Business
### Automations that keep you laser-focused on selling, not admin work
Manually tracking emails that were sent, calls that were made, or reminders to follow up are things of the past. We automate all of the admin work so you can focus your efforts on closing your next deal.
_I can automate responses, emails and trigger actions very easily, improving my chances of closing a lot more sales._
![Oscar Avila Headshot](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61717799a852418a278cfa9b/66571ec2995b718967981002_oscar-avila.png)

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61717799a852418a278cfa9b/61a9266b32ebe99fb6a77802_ic-fluent-call-checkmark-24-regular%201.svg)
### Built for the way sales teams actually sell 
We weren't happy with the CRM options on the market for our own sales reps, so we built Close‚Äîa CRM designed specifically for the workflows of fast, nimble teams.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61717799a852418a278cfa9b/6656417e2edc10a5815dafde_01-close-crm-smart-view-tasks.webp)
![blue building icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61717799a852418a278cfa9b/627d26ab2b1b7779af08ec71_building-blue-40.svg)
### Designed for small businesses and startups
Close is built to serve small businesses‚Äì‚Äìnot enterprises. Other CRMs try to cater to businesses of all sizes, which leads to cluttered UI, long implementation processes, and pricing catered toward big businesses.
![Activity Overview](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61717799a852418a278cfa9b/6656417ec19c79af0efe1d80_02-close-crm-opportunities.webp)
![blue handshake icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61717799a852418a278cfa9b/61bae122beedd35f6e36883f_ic-fluent-handshake-24-regular%203.svg)
### **Serving customers, not investors**
Close is a bootstrapped business, meaning we don't answer to anyone but our customers and their evolving needs. We‚Äôre constantly adding new features to make sure our customers are equipped with everything they need to keep up with sales trends.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61717799a852418a278cfa9b/6656417e49af014f8612c194_03-close-crm-customer-data.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61717799a852418a278cfa9b/6655bd7bfd2f873ce9e383b6_trend-icon.svg)
### **Flexible and transparent pricing**
Close‚Äôs pricing makes sense for small businesses, and is flexible as you grow. With free data migrations, incredible support, and affordable professional services, you‚Äôll get value from Close in your first month‚Äì‚Äìor we‚Äôll refund you, no questions asked.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61717799a852418a278cfa9b/66564183d7399115d642a154_04-close-crm-activity-overview-sm.webp)
